mapper.select: SELECT /* CommonCodeMapper.xml.getCommonCodeList */ C.DTL_CD, IFNULL(L.DTL_NM, C.DTL_NM) AS DTL_NM FROM T_COMMON_CODE C LEFT OUTER JOIN T_COMMON_CODE_LANGUAGE L ON C.GRP_CD = L.GRP_CD AND C.DEPTH = L.DEPTH AND C.DTL_CD = L.DTL_CD AND L.LANGUAGE = #{language} WHERE C.GRP_CD = #{grp_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.DEPTH = 3 AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY ALGN_ORD ASC

select /* CommonCodeMapper.xml.listCategoryChained */ C.category_id , C.parent_id , IFNULL(L.TITLE, C.TITLE) AS title from T_PRODUCT_CATEGORY C LEFT OUTER JOIN T_PRODUCT_CATEGORY_LANGUAGE L ON C.CATEGORY_ID = L.CATEGORY_ID AND L.LANGUAGE = #{language} where parent_id = #{parent_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by display_order

select /* CommonCodeMapper.xml.listCategoryChained */ C.category_id , C.parent_id , L.TITLE AS title from T_PRODUCT_CATEGORY C, T_PRODUCT_CATEGORY_LANGUAGE L where C.category_id = L.category_id and parent_id in (select C.category_id from T_PRODUCT_CATEGORY C LEFT OUTER JOIN T_PRODUCT_CATEGORY_LANGUAGE L ON C.CATEGORY_ID = L.CATEGORY_ID AND L.LANGUAGE = #{language} where C.parent_id ='0' order by C.category_id ) and LANGUAGE = #{language}
